body:
Hi Mostapha and team,



First of, thanks for a lovely suite as always.



I have problems however with the temporary folder for skyFilePaths on the genCumSky, as it creates it in my user folder on the computer. My user name in this firm is "users/firstname.surname". But it looks like the gridBasedSimulation is clipping the path at "users/firstname", so it cant find the temporary skyFile.



Any chance to add a custom path, so I can store the temporary skies in C:\temp  etc ?



Running version 0.0.59

replies.body: Hi Mathias, This was a bug in checking the path which I just fixed. You can either download the latest version or use the attached file which let's you copy the file to a new folder. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/krHPGcggBY5FYINsEdyVoER*TkGJ9iJXj87JANYEzuc-h2I9dq-LVcWlzUo6H1NMavir7qLWaQYyYfe9Pn5CSJMcVzTaaGww/copyFile.png) Mostapha
